lead_paragraph: The decision not to review a leg before wicket appeal on Australia's captain Steve Smith was the right one at the time as there was significant doubt from even people off the field, New Zealand coach Mike Hesson has said.

headline.print_headline: Decision Not to Review Smith Lbw Was Understandable-Hesson
headline.main: Decision Not to Review Smith Lbw Was Understandable-Hesson

snippet: The decision not to review a leg before wicket appeal on Australia's captain Steve Smith was the right one at the time as there was significant doubt from even people off the field, New Zealand coach Mike Hesson has said....
